name: ARSMagic DEMO Pre Pre Pre Alpha
name_original: ARSMagic DEMO Pre Pre Pre Alpha
description:
This is for the ARS Team and people who stumble across this horrible Pre Pre Pre Alpha Demo of ARSMagic.

It was made with 4 people and artwork is also their work too it's not only me It was made with other people's ideas and my own, specifically sprites made by Peter(Saigon) and the shrinking mechanic was taken from the Mario & Luigi series and some more minor-ish ones.

To control Chad (Player 1) use the arrow keys, Z for select, X for lightning, and C for Wing Spin

To control Chester (Player 2) use WASD, J for select, and L for shrink

1 for Chad camera and 2 for Chester camera (if you shrink you have to press it again)

Please email me all bugs arsmagicaaron@gmail.com

Thank you to @crabowitz or Mr. Whiskers for help and support

P.S. Some stock Sprite art used opengameart.org
